skill.created: A new Skill is created with identifier {{ param }}
skill.updated: A Skill is updated with identifier {{ param }}
skill.deleted: A Skill is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Skill {{ id }}?

skill.title: Title
skill.titleExplanationQuestion: What is the objective of the skill?
skill.titleExplanation: As short and clear as possible, since these are used in the notifications, Mattermost posts and in the overview lists. Since this is about "doing", verbs should be used to avoid misunderstandings.
skill.descriptionExplanation: Why is this skill relevant to the team/organization? Please describe the motivation and background of the skill!
skill.descriptionExplanationQuestion: Why is this skill relevant to the team/organization?
skill.implementationExplanation: Provide concrete help here to implement this skill. Please describe the scope of necessary activities. The description should be understandable by someone from the subject (default developer). Please formulate whole sentences.
skill.implementationExplanationQuestion: What kind of help could be provided for this skill's implementation?
skill.validationExplanation: What should have been "applied" or "implemented"? Try to describe individual steps in order to gain the skill so that it can be built, consolidated and perpetuated. Key points are sufficient.
